featured.text: Amir tried to get to the market on the following days, but the donkey ___(34)___ the same trick and ruined the salt.
As a result, much of the salt melted in the water, ruining the salt for Amir but ___(33)___
From then on, the donkey learned the lesson, and ___(40)___ carried Amir’s salt to the market without ruining it.
On ___(31)___, Amir and the donkey passed a stream.
Amir was very much ___(35)___ by the donkey’s trick, but did not know what to do.

other.text: The next day, Amir loaded the sacks ___(38)___ with salt but with sand.

definition.zh_def: 阿米爾，一個常見的男性名字，源於阿拉伯語，意為“王子”或“領袖”。
definition.en_def: Amir, a common male name of Arabic origin meaning 'prince' or 'leader'.
definition.example: Amir was chosen as the captain of the soccer team.
